description.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-1","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"call to submissions: short stories","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"we are always on the lookout for short stories to include in our annual anthology, the first edition of which you can find ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://9vtbackslash5.com/catalogue/between-there-and-now-too"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"here","marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":".","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"submissions can be fiction, nonfiction or in between, ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"of any genre and length.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"there is no limit to the number of submissions you can send, and we accept previously published work.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"we read every submission we receive, and strive to respond to all in due time.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}
